ModMetaData.name: [1.0] Balanced Tribal Apparel Patch
ModMetaData.author: Darkagma
ModMetaData.description:
Rebalances and modifies stuff from the ETRT: Tribal Apparel mod to vanilla-like levels using Xpath patches. Author: Vats Darkagma
- Early release: a few things still need to be tweaked like the actual costs and hassle to make hoods and helms with awesome mystical powers. Descriptions need to be improved too.
- Quick summary: - Production of hoods and helms require sacrificed animals offered at a campfire to be transmuted into mystical apparel. - Neolithic clothes nerfed to vanilla-like levels. Usually balanced by trading protection for insulation and vice-versa.
* Requirements:
- Requires ETRT: Tribal Apparel mod by Evil Tactician ( https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1544558250 ).
* ANY HARD COMPATABILITIES??
Could conflict with ZARS Tribal Reborn because that mod is a mess.
